title.rendered: How do you buy UPC codes?

content.rendered:
You can purchase UPC codes directly on our site at snapupc.com.  All of our codes come from the GS1 with no renewal or hidden fees, and are delivered instantly at checkout.  They work with all vendors including Amazon, Google Shopping, iTunes, eBay, and more!

Need codes?
